title: LEAN
heading: Agile. Scrum. LEAN!
content:
Shu Ha Ri.
Do. Understand.
Transcend.

As a starting point, we always use Scrum.

But after setting a baseline, we want to move forward.

This is where LEAN comes on place.

If you want to go beyond Scrum, LEAN offers a set of solid principles and values that can guide you through the journey.

Never stop improving.
